price: Ṣé kí Á ká Tírà Ìrántí (al-Ƙur’ān) kúrò nílẹ̀ fún yín pátápátá (kí Á máa wò yín ní ìran) nítorí pé, ẹ jẹ́ ìjọ alákọyọ?
arabic: أَفَنَضۡرِبُ عَنكُمُ ٱلذِّكۡرَ صَفۡحًا أَن كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا مُّسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: afanaḍribu ʿankumu al-dhik'ra ṣafḥan an kuntum qawman mus'rifīna
